# Exagic AI
> San Francisco AI SEO agency specializing in brand visibility optimization for industrial manufacturers, global suppliers, and hardware companies in the SF Bay Area corridor.

## Core Pages
- Home: https://exagic-ai.vercel.app/
- AI SEO Capabilities: https://exagic-ai.vercel.app/capabilities
- AEO Services: https://exagic-ai.vercel.app/capabilities/aeo
- SRO Services: https://exagic-ai.vercel.app/capabilities/sro
- Industries: https://exagic-ai.vercel.app/industries
- Resources / Lab: https://exagic-ai.vercel.app/lab
- Contact: https://exagic-ai.vercel.app/#contact

## What We Do
- Answer Engine Optimization (AEO) for industrial brands
- Selection Rate Optimization (SRO) for AI retrieval
- AI Visibility Tracking for Gemini, ChatGPT, and Perplexity
- Technical Entity Audits for SF Bay Area manufacturers
